MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH11 area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:50pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Stenhouse Avenue West substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3pm on Sunday, 04 April 2021
